cwn_entry.cwn_what:
Here are some links to messages at <http://discuss.ocaml.org> that may be of interest to the readers.
- Bobby Priambodo talks about "Databases and OCaml" <https://discuss.ocaml.org/t/databases-and-ocaml/913/1> - Ivan Gotovchits talks about "BAP tutorial" <https://discuss.ocaml.org/t/ann-bap-tutorial/915/1> - Hannes Mehnert talks about "4th MirageOS hack retreat (Nov 29 - Dec 6 2017)" <https://discuss.ocaml.org/t/4th-mirageos-hack-retreat-nov-29-dec-6-2017/929/1>

Here are links from many OCaml blogs aggregated at OCaml Planet, <http://ocaml.org/community/planet/>.
NAT your own packets <https://somerandomidiot.com/post/2017-10-09-nat-your-own-packets/>
Coq 8.7+beta2 is out <https://coq.inria.fr/news/138.html>
The BAP Tutorial <http://binaryanalysisplatform.github.io/bap-tutorial-announce>
